        public Action getActionByID(int actionID,
                            Controller controller)
                     throws WrongInputException
        It generates an Action object with reference to this GameHandler
        Parameters:
        actionID - the int ID of the action
        controller - The controller of the player who make the action
        Returns:
        An Action object according to the ID, the player and the modality of the game
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - If there's no action available for that ID anc that player
